languages.text: "Как я сказала, никто не знает, кто их лидер и где его база. Но я заметила вот такую штуку — самые новые анверские листовки, такие, которые прямо краской свежей пахнут, всегда в одном и том же районе на большом трущобном астероиде. Я вам сейчас нарисую, где именно..." {n}Женщина прямо на стойке рисует каплями выпивки схему.{/n} "Примерно тут. Я уверена, что печатают они свои вирши где-то в этом месте".

traits.locale_text: "Как я сказала, никто не знает, кто их лидер и где его база. Но я заметила вот такую штуку — самые новые анверские листовки, такие, которые прямо краской свежей пахнут, всегда в одном и том же районе на большом трущобном астероиде. Я вам сейчас нарисую, где именно..." {n}Женщина прямо на стойке рисует каплями выпивки схему.{/n} "Примерно тут. Я уверена, что печатают они свои вирши где-то в этом месте".

languages.text: "Like I said, no one knows who their leader is or where this leader operates from. But here's what I've noticed — the most recent Anver leaflets, the ones so fresh you can smell the ink off them, always show up in the same area on the big slum asteroid. Let me show you where it is real quick..." {n}She uses drops of liquor to draw a basic map right on the bar.{/n} "Right around here. I'm positive they're printing their little poems somewhere in this area."
languages.original_text: "Как я сказала, никто не знает, кто их лидер и где его база. Но я заметила вот такую штуку — самые новые анверские листовки, такие, которые прямо краской свежей пахнут, всегда в одном и том же районе на большом трущобном астероиде. Я вам сейчас нарисую, где именно..." {n}Женщина прямо на стойке рисует каплями выпивки схему.{/n} "Примерно тут. Я уверена, что печатают они свои вирши где-то в этом месте".

traits.locale_text: "Like I said, no one knows who their leader is or where this leader operates from. But here's what I've noticed — the newest Anver leaflets, the ones that pretty much smell of fresh paint, always show up in the same area at the large slum asteroid. Let me draw you where it is real quick..." {n}She uses drops of liquor to draw the basic layout right on the bar.{/n} "Right around here. I'm positive that they're printing their little poems somewhere in this area."

"Like I said, no one knows who their leader is or where this leader operates from. But here's what I've noticed — the newest Anver leaflets, the ones that pretty much smell of fresh paint, always show up in the same area at the large slum asteroid. Let me draw you where it is real quick..." {n}She uses drops of liquor to draw the basic layout right on the bar.{/n} "Right around here. I'm positive that they're printing their little poems somewhere in this area."

I'm positive they're printing their little poems somewhere in this area."

"Like I said, no one knows who their leader is or where this leader operates from. But here's what I've noticed — the most recent Anver leaflets, the ones so fresh you can smell the ink off them, always show up in the same area on the big slum asteroid. Let me show you where it is real quick..." {n}She uses drops of liquor to draw a basic map right on the bar.{/n} "Right around here. languages.text: “就像我刚刚说的，没人知道他们的领袖是谁，也没人知道那个人从哪里发号施令的。不过我注意到一件事情：安维尔帮最近的传单，那些能闻到新鲜油墨味的传单，它们总是出现在大贫民窟的同一个区域。我可以快速和你说说在什么地方……”{n}她用手指蘸着酒，在吧台上画了一张粗略的地图。{/n}“就在这附近。我敢肯定，他们那些传单，都是在这个地区的某个地方印刷出来的。”
languages.original_text: "Like I said, no one knows who their leader is or where this leader operates from. But here's what I've noticed — the most recent Anver leaflets, the ones so fresh you can smell the ink off them, always show up in the same area on the big slum asteroid. Let me show you where it is real quick..." {n}She uses drops of liquor to draw a basic map right on the bar.{/n} "Right around here. I'm positive they're printing their little poems somewhere in this area."

traits.locale_text: “就像我刚刚说的，没人知道他们的领袖是谁，也没人知道那个人从哪里发号施令的。不过我注意到一件事情：安维尔帮最近的传单，那些能闻到新鲜油墨味的传单，它们总是出现在大贫民窟的同一个区域。我可以快速和你说说在什么地方……”{n}她用手指蘸着酒，在吧台上画了一张粗略的地图。{/n}“就在这附近。我敢肯定，他们那些传单，都是在这个地区的某个地方印刷出来的。”

languages.text: «Como digo, nadie sabe desde dónde opera su líder ni quién es. Aunque me he dado cuenta de una cosa: los panfletos más recientes de los Anvers, los que se imprimieron hace tan poco que aún huelen a tinta, siempre aparecen en la misma zona del asteroide del suburbio grande. Voy a mostrarte dónde está...». {n}Dibuja un mapa básico sobre la barra usando gotas de licor.{/n} «Estoy segura de que están imprimiendo sus pequeños poemas en esta zona de aquí».
languages.original_text: "Like I said, no one knows who their leader is or where this leader operates from. But here's what I've noticed — the most recent Anver leaflets, the ones so fresh you can smell the ink off them, always show up in the same area on the big slum asteroid. Let me show you where it is real quick..." {n}She uses drops of liquor to draw a basic map right on the bar.{/n} "Right around here. I'm positive they're printing their little poems somewhere in this area."

traits.locale_text: «Como digo, nadie sabe desde dónde opera su líder ni quién es. Aunque me he dado cuenta de una cosa: los panfletos más recientes de los Anvers, los que se imprimieron hace tan poco que aún huelen a tinta, siempre aparecen en la misma zona del asteroide del suburbio grande. Voy a mostrarte dónde está...». {n}Dibuja un mapa básico sobre la barra usando gotas de licor.{/n} «Estoy segura de que están imprimiendo sus pequeños poemas en esta zona de aquí».

languages.text: 「さっき言ったように、リーダーが誰なのか、どこから指示を出しているのか誰も知らないんだ。でも、ひとつ気づいたことがある。インクの匂いがする刷りたてホヤホヤの最新のアンヴァースのビラは、いつも大きなスラム小惑星の同じ地域に現れるんだ。おおまかな場所を教えてやるよ…」{n}彼女は酒を数滴使い、バーに簡単な地図を描いた。{/n}「このあたりだ。多分、このあたりでご自慢のビラを刷ってる」
languages.original_text: "Like I said, no one knows who their leader is or where this leader operates from. But here's what I've noticed — the most recent Anver leaflets, the ones so fresh you can smell the ink off them, always show up in the same area on the big slum asteroid. Let me show you where it is real quick..." {n}She uses drops of liquor to draw a basic map right on the bar.{/n} "Right around here. I'm positive they're printing their little poems somewhere in this area."

traits.locale_text: 「さっき言ったように、リーダーが誰なのか、どこから指示を出しているのか誰も知らないんだ。でも、ひとつ気づいたことがある。インクの匂いがする刷りたてホヤホヤの最新のアンヴァースのビラは、いつも大きなスラム小惑星の同じ地域に現れるんだ。おおまかな場所を教えてやるよ…」{n}彼女は酒を数滴使い、バーに簡単な地図を描いた。{/n}「このあたりだ。多分、このあたりでご自慢のビラを刷ってる」

languages.text: "Wie gesagt, niemand weiß, wer ihr Anführer ist oder von wo er operiert. Aber mir ist etwas aufgefallen – die aktuellsten Anver-Handzettel, so frisch, dass man die Tinte noch riechen kann, tauchen immer im selben Bereich auf dem großen Slum-Asteroiden auf. Ich zeige Euch schnell, wo das ist ..." {n}Sie malt mit Schnaps eine einfache Karte direkt auf die Bar.{/n} "Genau hier. Ich bin sicher, sie drucken ihre kleinen Gedichte irgendwo in diesem Bereich."
languages.original_text: "Like I said, no one knows who their leader is or where this leader operates from. But here's what I've noticed — the most recent Anver leaflets, the ones so fresh you can smell the ink off them, always show up in the same area on the big slum asteroid. Let me show you where it is real quick..." {n}She uses drops of liquor to draw a basic map right on the bar.{/n} "Right around here. I'm positive they're printing their little poems somewhere in this area."

traits.locale_text: "Wie gesagt, niemand weiß, wer ihr Anführer ist oder von wo er operiert. Aber mir ist etwas aufgefallen – die aktuellsten Anver-Handzettel, so frisch, dass man die Tinte noch riechen kann, tauchen immer im selben Bereich auf dem großen Slum-Asteroiden auf. Ich zeige Euch schnell, wo das ist ..." {n}Sie malt mit Schnaps eine einfache Karte direkt auf die Bar.{/n} "Genau hier. Ich bin sicher, sie drucken ihre kleinen Gedichte irgendwo in diesem Bereich."

languages.text: « Comme je vous l'ai dit, personne ne sait qui est leur leader, ni où il se cache pour tirer les ficelles. Mais j'ai quand même remarqué un truc : les dernières brochures des Anver, celles à l'encre encore fraîche, apparaissent toujours dans le même coin de cet astéroïde délabré. Je vais vous indiquer où, vite fait... » {n}Avec un peu de liqueur, elle trace une carte toute simple à même le bar.{/n} « Juste là. Je suis persuadée que c'est dans cette zone qu'ils impriment leurs petits poèmes. »
languages.original_text: "Like I said, no one knows who their leader is or where this leader operates from. But here's what I've noticed — the most recent Anver leaflets, the ones so fresh you can smell the ink off them, always show up in the same area on the big slum asteroid. Let me show you where it is real quick..." {n}She uses drops of liquor to draw a basic map right on the bar.{/n} "Right around here. I'm positive they're printing their little poems somewhere in this area."

traits.locale_text: « Comme je vous l'ai dit, personne ne sait qui est leur leader, ni où il se cache pour tirer les ficelles. Mais j'ai quand même remarqué un truc : les dernières brochures des Anver, celles à l'encre encore fraîche, apparaissent toujours dans le même coin de cet astéroïde délabré. Je vais vous indiquer où, vite fait... » {n}Avec un peu de liqueur, elle trace une carte toute simple à même le bar.{/n} « Juste là. Je suis persuadée que c'est dans cette zone qu'ils impriment leurs petits poèmes. »

languages.text: "Dediğim gibi işte. Bu adamların elebaşı kimdir, nerededir bilen yok. Asıl fark ettiğimse şu: Yeni basılmış, daha mürekkebi kurumamış Anver bildirileri hep büyük gecekondu asteroidindeki aynı bölgede ortaya çıkıyor. Neresi olduğunu göstereyim hemen." {n}İçki damlacıklarını kullanarak tezgâhta basit bir harita çiziyor.{/n} "Hemen şurası. O pek kıymetli şiirlerini buralarda bir yerlerde bastıklarından eminim."
languages.original_text: "Like I said, no one knows who their leader is or where this leader operates from. But here's what I've noticed — the most recent Anver leaflets, the ones so fresh you can smell the ink off them, always show up in the same area on the big slum asteroid. Let me show you where it is real quick..." {n}She uses drops of liquor to draw a basic map right on the bar.{/n} "Right around here. I'm positive they're printing their little poems somewhere in this area."

traits.locale_text: "Dedim ya, bu adamların lideri kimdir, nerededir bilen yok. Asıl fark ettiğimse şu... Yeni basılmış, daha mürekkebi kurumamış Anver broşürleri, hep büyük gecekondu asteroidinde aynı bölgede ortaya çıkıyor. Neresi olduğunu göstereyim hemen..." {n}İçki damlacıklarını kullanarak, barda basit bir harita çiziyor.{/n} "Hemen şurası. O pek kıymetli şiirlerini buralarda bir yerlerde bastıklarından eminim."
